name: current-user-avatar-nextjs
title: Current User Avatar (Next.js)
description: A reactive avatar component that displays the current authenticated user's image and name. Updates automatically when user data changes. Includes Convex backend for user queries.
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server.

2. Copy the deployment URL to your `.env.local` file as `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`.

3. This component requires Convex Auth to be configured. Make sure you have authentication set up in your project.

4. The Convex schema and functions will be automatically deployed when you run `npx convex dev`.
